messages.content: Only Josh Mason can beat Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour candidate here
The Conservatives have NEVER WON in this constituency and did nothing to stop the steel closure
Only the Lib Dems have a record of beating Labour here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save the NHS by putting a penny on the pound on income tax to give the NHS and social care services the cash they need
Boost the local economy with a major programme of capital investment for jobs
Invest £7.5 billion extra in children’s education. Triple the Early Years Pupil Premium to £1000
Limit the amount elderly people have to pay for social care. Keep the Triple Lock on pensions
Make waiting times for mental health care match those for physical health care
Increase community policing, investing an extra £300 million a year in local police forces
Two-thirds off bus travel for 16–21 year-olds with a Young Person’s Bus Discount Card

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Liberal Democrat Josh Mason can beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate here. The Conservatives have NEVER WON in this constituency.
